participant_1.name: Claire
participant_1.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, with a deep appreciation for culture and beauty.
participant_1.background: i am a museum tour guide. i'm partly deaf. i love to drink fancy tea. i have a big library at home. i grow roses in my garden.

participant_2.name: Jason
participant_2.personality: Energetic and competitive, with a strong focus on family and health.
participant_2.background: i am married to a doctor. my family is continuously growing. i am a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house.
